sqlMap.select: select ID, IVU_TASK_ID, CMS_ACCOUNT, TASK_ID, CMS_ACCOUNT_PASSWORD, IVU_CODE, ALG_CODE, ALG_SUPPLIER_CODE, VIDEO_SOURCE, RTSP, HTTP, CUSTOMER_USER_NAME, CUSTOMER_USER_PASSWORD, CMS_IP, CMS_PORT, CMS_GUID, RESULT_UP_TYPE, RESULT_UP_URL, RESULT_UP_IP, RESULT_UP_PORT, PIC_DATA_UP_IP, PIC_DATA_UP_PORT, ALG_POLICY, TASK_STATUS, ACTION_TYPE, CAMERA_ID, ORGAN_ID from IVU_TASK where ID = #id:VARCHAR#

select ID, IVU_TASK_ID, CMS_ACCOUNT, TASK_ID, CMS_ACCOUNT_PASSWORD, IVU_CODE, ALG_CODE, ALG_SUPPLIER_CODE, VIDEO_SOURCE, RTSP, HTTP, CUSTOMER_USER_NAME, CUSTOMER_USER_PASSWORD, CMS_IP, CMS_PORT, CMS_GUID, RESULT_UP_TYPE, RESULT_UP_URL, RESULT_UP_IP, RESULT_UP_PORT, PIC_DATA_UP_IP, PIC_DATA_UP_PORT, ALG_POLICY, TASK_STATUS, ACTION_TYPE, CAMERA_ID, ORGAN_ID from IVU_TASK
order by $orderByClause$
